amendment.description: To provide for an exception for voice and other services over the Internet.l

vote.text: Amendment SA 3105 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3105 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 3048. (consideration: CR S4661-4662; text: CR S4661) To provide for an exception for voice and other services over the Internet.l
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3105 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
